pr_title: New DateRange and CodeListEntry job parameters

timeline.message:
Adds a new job parameter for DateRange entries

Fixes: OX-5522

Adds a new job parameter for codelist entries

A new getEntry helper method has been added to retrieve the raw entry object

Fixes: OX-5522

Properly validates if a codelist entry exists

tryGetValues would return the code itself with null value when the entry do not exist.

Fixes: OX-5522

timeline.bodyText: Maybe call list either list or codeList and the Param above codeListName?
timeline.author: sabieber
